definition: to be lost/to be ruined/to perish/to wither away
to sink (into ruin, oblivion)/to be reduced to
to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged

sentences.english: It can be said of moral turpitude.
The price is strategic and moral bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 代價是戰略的丟失和道德的淪喪。
